data.title: Bridge Of Books Foundation
data.text:
Changing Kids' LivesOne Book at a Time

All kids should have books to call their own.

Got Books

Wondering what to do with all the books that your kids and grandkids have outgrown? Let us get them into the hands of kids who need them.

DONATE BOOKS

Need Books

Do you work with children who need books in their homes to keep and call their own?

We are here to help!

REQUEST BOOKS

Volunteer

We welcome all who are interested in helping us get books into the hands, homes, and communities of children where they are most needed.

LEARN MORE

Our Mission

Bringing the World to Children with Books

Bridge of Books Foundation is a 501(c)(3) non-profit, volunteer-led organization. Our mission is to provide an ongoing source of books to underserved children throughout New Jersey in order to support the development of literacy skills and to encourage a love of reading.
